text: Sishu Bholanath (; English: "The Child Bholanath") is a Bengali book of poems written by Rabindranath Tagore. It was published in 1922. It consists of 27 poems.শিশু ভোলানাথ – রবীন্দ্র রচনাবলী It is a famous work of Tagore for the children. == Theme == The desire, imagination and courage of child is the main theme of the book.রবীন্দ্রনাথের কিশোরকবিতা – দৈনিক আজাদী The poems are rhythmic and enriched with the thoughts of greatness. Most of the poems are written addressing a silent mother. The natural object is also an integral part of the book. == List of poems == The poems of "Sishu Bholanath" are: * Sishu bholanath * Buri * Mone para * Sat samudra pare * Pathhara * Dur * Ichhamati * Rajmishtri * Martabasi * Sishur jibon * Robibar * Putul bhanga * Jyotishi * Sanshajee * Baul * Anyo maa * Ghumer tatva * Bani-binimoy *Talgach (poem) * Somoyhara * Murkhu * Khela-bhola * Raja o rani * Dustu * Duyorani * Dui ami * Bristi roudra == References == Category:1922 poetry books Category:Bengali poetry collections Category:Poetry collections by Rabindranath Tagore
title: Sishu Bholanath
